meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the radical are the same, so remembering the meaning of this kanji is as simple as making sure you know the radical for <radical>oneself</radical> first! If you know the radical, you know this kanji means <kanji>oneself</kanji> as well.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Oneself</kanji>. Who only thinks of oneself? Every <reading>子</reading> (こ) in the world.
